    • Constructor Detail

      • XPathFactoryFinder

        public XPathFactoryFinder(ClassLoader loader)

        Constructor that specifies ClassLoader to use to find XPathFactory.

        Parameters:
        loader - to be used to load resource, XPathFactory, and SchemaFactoryLoader implementations during the resolution process. If this parameter is null, the default system class loader will be used.

      • newFactory

        public XPathFactory newFactory(String uri)

        Creates a new XPathFactory object for the specified schema language.

        Parameters:
        uri - Identifies the underlying object model.
        Returns:
        null if the callee fails to create one.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the parameter is null.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        XPathFactory for the given object model.

      • loadFromService

        private XPathFactory loadFromService(String objectModel,
                           String inputName,
                           InputStream in)
                              throws IOException

        Look up a value in a property file.

        Set debug to true to trace property evaluation.

        Parameters:
        objectModel - URI of object model to support.
        inputName - Name of InputStream.
        in - InputStream of properties.
        Returns:
        XPathFactory as determined by keyName value or null if there was an error.
        Throws:
        IOException - If IO error reading from in.

        Returns:

      • which

        private static String which(String classname,
           ClassLoader loader)

        Search the specified classloader for the given classname.

        Parameters:
        classname - the fully qualified name of the class to search for
        loader - the classloader to search
        Returns:
        the source location of the resource, or null if it wasn't found
